[Home](./index) &gt; [@mo-yu/vue](./vue) &gt; [useLoading](./vue.useloading)

## useLoading() function

全局共享 loading 方法

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useLoading(): LoadingInjection
```

**Returns:**

[LoadingInjection](./vue.loadinginjection)

## Example

```ts
import { useLoading } from '@mo-yu/vue'

const { addLoading } = useLoading()

const remove = addLoading()
fetchSomething()
  .then(() => {
    remove()
  })
  .catch(() => {
    remove()
  })
```
